Text: Call me retarded, but I can't seem to figure out how to delete the bad torrent of this...  Any hints?

Ah!  Forget it...  I spotted the tiny red "X" and deleted the old torrent that was missing a couple of songs.  (I think it wasn't showing up on Firefox - when I switched to Safari I was able to see it).  Enjoy the sweet Lips rarities!!!
